revisionDesc.change: Add dummy header for original identifier 'papyri.info/ddbdp/sb;1;5577' pointing to new identifier 'papyri.info/ddbdp/p.kru;;44'

Vote - AcceptText - See Cook comments, with a few alterations and additions below. Regarding οὔτε/οὐδε, prefer οὔτε for uses here (see Boud'hors comments in P.KRU 37). In addition: lin11: ⲧⲉ<:κέλευσις=grc|reg|ⲕⲗⲉⲩⲥ[ⲓⲥ]:> ==> ⲧ<:κέλευσις=grc|reg|ⲕⲉⲗⲉⲩⲥ[ⲓⲥ]:> ; lin13: <#<:δωδέκατος=grc|reg|ⲇⲱⲇⲉⲕⲁⲧⲏ:>=12#> add numbers markup ; lin19: πληροφορέω ==> πληροφορεῖν ; lin41: <:πρός=grc|reg|ⲡⲣⲟⲥ:> add markup ; lin78: <#ⲟⲩⲁ=1#> add numbers markup ; <#ⲥⲛⲁⲩ=2#> add numbers markup ; lin81, 88, 90, 91: Regularise ⲏ, but keep stauros rather than supralinear stroke, as follows: <:ἤ=grc|reg|ⲏ:>\*stauros*/ ; lin90: keep as ⲅⲉ, contrary to Cook ; lin90-91: Ignore Cook comment and avoid indicating deletion for now to focus on reproducing ed.princ. ; lin91: keep as ⲧⲩⲡⲱ\*stauros*/ⲥ ; lin104: ⲉϥⲛⲁϣⲛⲡⲉ ==> ⲉϥⲛⲁϣⲱⲡⲉ ; lin127: add $m2 before rho-cross ; lin129: add $m3 before stauros ; lin131: add $m4 at start of line ; lin133: add $m5 before rho-cross ; lin134, 135, 137: <:ⲙⲙⲛⲧⲣⲉ|reg|ⲙⲛⲧⲣⲉ:> ; lin139: add $m1 before stauros ; lin144: not sure about Cook's proposed regularisation here, so best to disregard for now ; lin149: spatium ==> vac.? ; ⲛⲧⲁϥⲕⲟⲧϥ underdot second fi

Vote - AcceptText - Begin with 1. lost.?lin
